cards.name: Clockwork Goblin
cards.flavor: A mechanical mercenary that can reassemble itself.

cards.name: Cursed Doll

effect.hex: Select 2 friendly minions. One takes 2 damage, the other heals 2.
effect.reshuffle: You may choose to reshuffle another card instead of this card, from your hand or any of the minion's /ancestry/.

cards.flavor: Being next to one of these can make one better or worse.

cards.name: Marionette

effect.hex: Until the start of your next turn, this Minion cannot be damaged.
effect.ancestor: When an effect is selecting a target, you can reshuffle this card to force the effect to target this minion.

cards.flavor: A mechanical man who seems not to be in control of himself.

effect.hex: Select 2 friendly minions in an order. For each, this minion deals 1 damage to itself, then activate the target's /Hex/ ability.
effect.trait: Whenever a minion tries to activate its /Command/ effect, you can choose to have that minion do 2 damage to this minion and cancel the /Command/ effect.

cards.name: Puppet Ranger

effect.hex: Damage the minion of opposite rank by 2, and damage both minions of adjacent ranks by 1.

cards.flavor: A moving puppet; as soft as silk, as deadly as thorns.

cards.name: Half-Nova

effect.hex: Activate this minion's /Command/ effect, and then activate it again if the opposing minion has lower HP that this minion.
effect.command: Deal 2 damage to the opposing minion.

cards.flavor: A serpent statue that feels very much alive.

cards.name: Clayman

effect.hex: Reshuffle the top 3 cards in this minion's /ancestry/. If this minion has less than 3 cards in its /ancestry/, reshuffle all cards in its /ancestry/ deal 2 damage to itself.
effect.ancestor: Whenever this minion deals damage, heal its HP by 1.

cards.flavor: A humanoid monster made of chocolate.

effect.hex: Reshuffle any card from this minion's /ancestry/. If the reshuffled card has a /hex/ effect, activate it.
effect.trait: Whenever the opposing minion activates any of its effect, once it is resolved, activate this minion's /hex/ effect.

cards.name: Arcana Golem

effect.hex: Switch with a minion on the left or on the right.
effect.switch: Before the switch, activate the /Hex/ effect of the switching minion. After the switch, activate the /Hex/ effect of the switching minion again.

cards.flavor: A towering golem overflowing with magic.

cards.name: Storm Incarnate

effect.hex: A random enemy minion deals 1 damage to this minion.
effect.trait: Whenever a minion deals damage to this minion, deal 1 damage to it, and deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.

cards.flavor: An uncontrollable mass of cloud and lightning.

boss.name: Arcanatorium
boss.summon: On a minion taking damage, when all minion has 7 or less HP after the damage.

effect.hex: Deal 1 damage to itself, and 2 damage to all other minions.
effect.trait: Whenever a minion tries to activate its /Hex/ effect, you can cancel it and activate this minion's /Hex/ effect.
